Interfaces

Interface RacingTrackInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RacingTrackInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Racing Track interface to implement the stub for other entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHorseToRace(SerializableHorse horse)
      Add horse to the list of horses that are on the next race.

      Broker signals that the race has ended.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTrackDistance

        void calculateTrackDistance(int raceNumber)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the track distance to a value between min_distance and max_distance. Also sets the race number in the logger.
        Parameters:
        raceNumber - number of the race
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • startRace

        void startRace()
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Notify all horses to start the race.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • endRace

        void endRace()
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Broker signals that the race has ended.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • reportResults

        void reportResults()
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Report results about the race to the logger.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getTheWinners

        java.util.ArrayList<SerializableHorse> getTheWinners()
                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the horse/jockey winners in a race.
        Returns:
        list of the horse/jockey winners
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • clearRacePositions

        void clearRacePositions()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Clear the race positions. Waits for all spectators to leave the race, and clears the variables that refer to the race.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • addHorseToRace

        void addHorseToRace(SerializableHorse horse)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Add horse to the list of horses that are on the next race.
        Parameters:
        horse - serializable horse to be added to the race
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • proceedToStartLine

        void proceedToStartLine(int id)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send horse to the start line. Waits for the broker to start the race, or for any movement of any other horse, to start the race.
        Parameters:
        id - horse id
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • hasFinishedLineBeenCrossed

        boolean hasFinishedLineBeenCrossed(int horseDistance)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Checks if the finish line has been crossed.
        Parameters:
        horseDistance - distance that the horse has travelled
        Returns:
        true if the horse crossed the finish line, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • makeAMove

        int[] makeAMove(int id)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Horse makes a move. Horse waits for his turn to move, then updates his distance and the number of iterations. If it has finished the race, removes himself from the list of running horses and adds itself to the final positions. At the end, if there are still horses to be woke, wakes up the next horse.
        Parameters:
        id - horse id
        Returns:
        array with two positions: the horse distance and the horse iterations
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getHorsesInRace

        java.util.ArrayList<SerializableHorse> getHorsesInRace()
                                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get a list of the horses in the race.
        Returns:
        horses in the race
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • spectatorEndRace

        void spectatorEndRace()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Spectator ended the race round. He is ready for another race.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • goWatchTheRace

        void goWatchTheRace(int id)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Spectator is watching the race.
        Parameters:
        id - spectator id
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • serviceEnd

        void serviceEnd()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Stop the service and shuts down the shared region.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
